ingredients.ingredient: 1 large head cauliflower, broken into large pieces
1 pinch garlic salt, or more to taste
1 pinch garlic powder, or more to taste
1 pinch ground black pepper, or more to taste
1 pinch red pepper flakes, or more to taste

cookingTips: Pulse cauliflower in food processor until rice-sized, then cook in oil to release excess moisture
Whisk egg whites and whole eggs together and pour over cooled cauliflower
